text: This name uses Portuguese naming customs. The first or maternal family name is Soares and the second or paternal family name is Nconco. Agostinho Soares Nconco (born 27 January 1990), known simply as Nconco, is a Guinea-Bissauan professional footballer who plays for Portuguese club Covilhã as a left back . ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Bissau-Guinean footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Guinea-Bissau international footballers Category:Bissau- Guinean expatriate footballers Category:Bissau-Guinean expatriate sportspeople in Mali Category:Bissau-Guinean expatriate sportspeople in Brazil Category:Bissau-Guinean expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Mali Category:Expatriate footballers in Brazil Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:LigaPro players Category:S.C. Covilhã players Category:2017 Africa Cup of Nations players
title: Agostinho Soares
